title: Bloodfist VIII: Hard Way Out
description: Don "The Dragon" Wilson stars as Mack, a retired CIA agent. But when a crack squad of assassins targets him for termination, class is dismissed. In a furious blaze of fists and bullets, Mack (along with his wisecracking son) crosses the globe to get the bad guys before they get him and in so doing, uncovers a conspiracy that threatens to shake the CIA to its very core.
details: {"Audio languages": ["English"], "Subtitles": ["English [CC]"], "Directors": ["Rick Jacobson"], "Producers": ["Mary Ann Fisher", "Roger Corman"], "Starring": ["Don Wilson", "Jillian McWhirter"]}
